text: @realDonaldTrump Hey Trump how about focusing on the real things for once? Want to explain why a black CNN reporter was arrested on live TV? Or want to acknowledge the hundred thousand now dead from COVID-19 because of your mismanagement? Or do you only have one mode: talk nonsense.
